callback_with_context.context_function_id: ritual.IsComplete && self.ParentContext.ChildIndex > 1 && self.ParentContext.ChildIndex - 1 < Chieftains.DeferenceGroupListFromBase(ritual).Size && Chieftains.IsDeferenceTierComplete(resource, ritual, self.ParentContext.ChildIndex) == false

callback_with_context.context_object_id: CcoCampaignGroupRecord group, CcoCampaignPooledResource resource, CcoEffectBundle bundle
callback_with_context.context_function_id: Loc("wh3_dlc25_chieftain_fealty_required", bundle.Name, RoundFloat(MaxNumericValue(0, resource.Total - group.MinRange)), group.MaxRange - group.MinRange + 1)

callback_with_context.context_object_id: CcoCampaignRitual ritual, CcoCampaignPooledResource resource, CcoCampaignGroupRecord group
callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(group.MaxRange == resource.Max, 1, Percentage(resource.Total - group.MinRange, group.MaxRange + GetIfElse(group.MaxRange == resource.Max, 0, 1) - group.MinRange))

callback_with_context.context_object_id: CcoCampaignRitual ritual, CcoCampaignPooledResource resource, CcoCampaignGroupRecord group
callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(group.MaxRange == resource.Max, 1, Percentage(resource.Total - group.MinRange, group.MaxRange + GetIfElse(group.MaxRange == resource.Max, 0, 1) - group.MinRange))
Percentage(resource.Total - group.MinRange, group.MaxRange + GetIfElse(group.MaxRange == resource.Max, 0, 1) - group.MinRange)
Format("%d/%d", RoundFloat(MaxNumericValue(0, resource.Total - group.MinRange)), group.MaxRange - group.MinRange + 1)

localised_text.tooltip_text: Reach the Committed Fealty Level to unlock this battle

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | IsScriptLocked => ScriptLockedReason | CanAfford == false => Loc("unlock_ritual_insufficient_dominance") | CanAfford == false => Loc("unlock_ritual_insufficient_dominance") | Loc("unlock_ritual_recruit_chieftain")

dy_change_holder.componentleveltooltip: [[col:yellow]]You gain 1 Conclave Influence per turn per region you own.You can gain up to 5 additional Conclave Influence per turn from your Towers[[/col]]

needed to stop flickering hover state of the content_holder

material_selected_chieftain.comment: do not delete, will be used later in reveal animation when we open the panel

panel_smoke_t.comment: Opacity set to 0 so that when material cant be shown (loading screens) it doesnt leave a blank white image around!

component_text.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Quis ipsum suspendisse ultrices gravida. Risus commodo viverra maecenas accumsan lacus vel facilisis.
Activate Chieftain Abilities to gain powerful bonuses.
Purchased units are recruited from the Chieftain Units Recruitment Panel.

The tight bonds among a pack of werekin are severed only in death, leaving scars that never truly heal. Such are the wounds of Mournhowl, a ferocious and tragic figure among his tribe, who after the brutal slaughter of his kin now lets his grief echo through the night. With much of his tribe devoured by a giant jabberslythe named Skraelsbane, driven to madness and tainted by the winds of magic, Mournhowl alone leads the survivors in their quest for vengeance. With violent retribution in his heart, his powerful form stalks the land, vowing never to rest until the blood of his pack has finally been avenged.
The tight bonds among a pack of Werekin are severed only in death, leaving scars that never truly heal. Such are the wounds of Mournhowl.
